values: Bernard Hudson: New Orleans Attack, Cybertruck Explosion, CIA Corruption, & Tulsi Gabbard

Permanent Washington is trying to prevent Tulsi Gabbard from becoming Director of National Intelligence. Bernard Hudson ran counterterrorism at CIA, and says the country needs her.

(00:00) Life in the CIA
(07:00) The Invasion of Iraq Was a Complete Disaster

(35:44) The Unchecked Power of Our Intel Agencies
